00009 require_once 'src/QueryPath/QueryPath.php';
00010 require_once 'src/QueryPath/Extension/QPXML.php';
00011 /**
00012  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00013  */
00014 class QPXMLTests extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00015   
00016   protected $file = './test/advanced.xml';
00017   
00018   public function testCDATA() {
00019     $this->assertEquals('This is a CDATA section.', qp($this->file, 'first')->cdata());
00020     
00021     $msg = 'Another CDATA Section';
00022     $this->assertEquals($msg, qp($this->file, 'second')->cdata($msg)->top()->find('second')->cdata());
00023   }
00024   
00025   public function testComment(){
00026     $this->assertEquals('This is a comment.', trim(qp($this->file, 'root')->comment()));
00027     $msg = "Message";
00028     $this->assertEquals($msg, qp($this->file, 'second')->comment($msg)->top()->find('second')->comment());
00029   }
00030   
00031   public function testProcessingInstruction() {
00032     $this->assertEquals('This is a processing instruction.', trim(qp($this->file, 'third')->pi()));
00033     $msg = "Message";
00034     $this->assertEquals($msg, qp($this->file, 'second')->pi('qp', $msg)->top()->find('second')->pi());
00035   }
00036 }
